policies.title: Policies
policies.subtitle: Everything you need to know about booking, payments, and participating in our retreats.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.depositText: The deposit reserves your spot on the upcoming Rainbow Surf Retreat. The ticket options on our website are 10% deposit fees for the full ticketed amount.
paymentTerms.schedule1: 10% deposit due at booking to reserve your spot
paymentTerms.schedule2: 2nd instalment (50%) due 3 months before the retreat
paymentTerms.schedule3: Balance (40%, or 30% with early bird discount) due no later than 1 month before the event
paymentTerms.methodsText: Payments can be made by card, bank transfer, or in cash upon arrival. Bank details available upon request.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.byCancelText: If Rainbow Surf Retreats cancels (due to situations like weather, issues with local providers, or unforeseen events), you'll get a full refund of your deposit. However, we can't reimburse extra costs like flights.
cancellation.byYou1: We'll refund your fee if we or you can find someone to take your spot
cancellation.byYou2: If your cancellation is less than 2 weeks before the retreat, unfortunately, we can't refund your deposit anymore
cancellation.noteText: We strongly recommend purchasing travel insurance that includes cancellation coverage to protect your investment.

insurance.title: Travel Insurance
insurance.required: For your safety, travel insurance is required for all participants.
insurance.mustInclude1: Surfing coverage (some policies consider surfing an "extreme sport")
insurance.tipText: Double-check that your insurance specifically covers water sports and surfing activities. Not all standard travel insurance policies include this.

whatToBring.title: What to Bring
whatToBring.intro: Here's what we recommend packing for your surf retreat adventure:
whatToBring.essentials1: Valid passport (check visa requirements for your destination)
whatToBring.optional1: Your own wetsuit (if you have one)

legal.title: Legal Terms
legal.text: This retreat is organized under Spanish law. By booking, you're agreeing to our terms and conditions and understand that any disputes will be handled in Spanish courts.
